description: A free family day out for the littleuns, bigguns and middleuns! Come see our unique, purpose built live arts venue, and enjoy some of the free family activities on offer. Streatham Space Project is neighbourhood arts venue and charity.

events.name: Drop in
events.notes: Family Day at SSP is a fun mix of interactive performances and activities for young people (ages 0-11yrs) and their adults

factsheet.heading: SSP Family Day
paragraphs: Family Day at SSP is a fun mix of interactive performances and activities for young people (ages 0-11yrs) and their adults. There could be storytelling, folk music, dancing, origami, painting, play dough modelling or doodling - drop in to see what we have in store!

images.title: Young people and their adults enjoying the Space on Family Day!

travel_info: Train: West Norwood, Streatham Hill, Streatham Common, Streatham, Brixton, Balham
Additional travel info: 30 seconds from Streatham Hill Station - main entrance situated on Sternhold Ave, opposite Proky's Wine Bar

name: Streatham Space Project Family Day
